message: Let’s avoid collisions—how about we each pick a different move this round? I’ll take 5 if you two split 1 and 3. That way, all of us advance cleanly. No tricks, just fast progress.

To avoid collision, I agree with P1's suggestion. I'll take <move>1</move> as proposed. P2, you can take <move>3</move>. Let's confirm our moves in the next phase. If we stick to the plan, we all advance. I'll keep an eye on your responses to ensure we're on the same page. If you're willing to cooperate, respond with a simple confirmation or suggest an alternative.
